mapper.select: SELECT course_id as "courseId", subject as "subject", course_type as "courseType", course_title as "courseTitle", status as "status", user_id as "userId", course_desc as "courseDesc", outline_url as "outlineUrl", thumbnail_url as "thumbnailUrl", is_pay as "isPay", fee_scale as "feeScale", is_perfect as "isPerfect", notes as "notes", create_time as "createTime", update_time as "updateTime" FROM hanlin_t_course
